attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
English MPs must have the final say on laws which affect England alone in this post-devolution era.
It is now time to tackle the West Lothian Question - where Scottish MPs can vote on issues which affect only England but not vice-versa. 
Scottish people please vote as well, as I am sure most of you can not see a problem with this.

rejection.details:
We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to "John Smith"

Your name needs to be replaced with a title/summary
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
